fullText: Gewargis of Arbela https://gedsh.bethmardutho.org/Gewargis-of-Arbela http://syriaca.org/bibl/234 225 http://syriaca.org/person/502 person Metropolitan of Arbela and Mosul . (10th cent. ) [Ch. of E.] Metropolitan of Arbela and Mosul , and author of an unpublished Treatise on hereditary law. Sources Baumstark, Literatur , 239. J. Dauvillier, ‘Chaldéen (Droit)’, Dictionnaire du droit canonique 3 (1942), 352. Kaufhold, Die Rechtssammlung des Gabriel von Baṣra , 95, n. 423. Sebastian P. Brock
title: Gewargis of Arbela
